manifestAppName.description: The name of the extension in the manifest.

manifestAppDescription.message: RavenDOI allows you to change DOI numbers into clickable links to any site such as sci-hub for example.

popupAppName.description: The name of the extension in the popup view.

IncorrectBaseUrlMessage.description: Message for a wrong formatted base URL.

optionContactUs.message: Contact us through our website
